title: Perspective Shift
description: Something clicks and you see a situation, yourself, or life differently. The shift feels profound.
responses: Journal about this realization
Share it with your partner
Let it inform your choices going forward

title: Uncomfortable Truth
description: You realize something about yourself that's hard to accept. Growth hurts sometimes.
responses: Sit with the discomfort
Talk it through with your partner
Decide what to do with this awareness

title: Breaking a Pattern
description: You catch yourself about to repeat an old pattern - and choose differently. The power of that choice is exhilarating!
responses: Acknowledge this victory
Notice how it feels to choose differently
Keep building on this progress

title: Therapy Breakthrough
description: If you're in therapy, you have a breakthrough session. If not, you have a moment of deep self-understanding.
responses: Process and integrate the insight
Share what you're comfortable sharing with your partner
Appreciate the work you're doing on yourself

title: Forgiveness
description: You find it in yourself to forgive - yourself, your partner, or someone else. The weight lifts.
responses: Feel the freedom that comes with letting go
Communicate the forgiveness if appropriate
Notice how much energy you get back

title: Boundary Setting
description: You successfully set a boundary you've needed to set for a while. It's uncomfortable but necessary.
responses: Hold the boundary even if there's pushback
Feel proud of advocating for yourself
Notice the respect it creates

title: Vulnerability Moment
description: You allow yourself to be truly vulnerable with your partner. Scary but deepening.
responses: Trust the process
Appreciate their response
Let this deepen your connection

title: Old Dream Revisited
description: You reconnect with a dream or passion you'd set aside. Do you still want it? Can you pursue it now?
responses: Explore what it means to you now
Talk with your partner about making space for it
Decide if and how to pursue it

title: Asking for Help
description: You actually ask for help instead of struggling alone. This is growth!
responses: Accept the help graciously
Notice it doesn't make you weak
Remember this for next time

title: Values Clarification
description: You get clearer on what actually matters to you. Your values feel more defined and actionable.
responses: Start living more aligned with these values
Share them with your partner
Let them guide your decisions
